text: Andrea Weigand (born 1977) is a Canadian international lawn bowler. She won a silver medal in the fours with Shirley Fitzpatrick-Wong, Melissa Ranger and Anita Nivala at the 1998 Commonwealth Games in Kuala Lumpur. Weigand is also a former Canadian National fours champion. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1977 births Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Canada Category:Bowls players at the 2002 Commonwealth Games Category:Canadian female bowls players Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for Canada
title: Andrea Weigand
